# The `Counter` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> is an abstract value that describes how to compute the execution count for a region of code using the collected profile count data. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::coverage::Counter</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> is an abstract value that describes how to compute the execution count for a region of code using the collected profile count data.

Definition at line 107 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3cec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::coverage::Counter::CounterKind ">
The <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counterexpression">CounterExpression</a> kind (Add or Subtract) is encoded in bit 0 next to the <a href="#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3cec">CounterKind</a>.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca67a8514f4af2332820b159b681e49b1a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Zero">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca4d833352a08a316752f999f56e6bf06e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CounterValueReference">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca3414aa40642d6bfd511e941d82ed1780" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Expression">

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

This means <a href="#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3cec">CounterKind</a> has to leave bit 0 free.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h/#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
